topics.body:
Haven't gotten around to 2, still playing through Bayonetta the first.  Very good, excellent protagonist.  Probably the most confident character in gaming, off the top of my head.

Smash is phenomenal, as we all knew it would be, and is made infinitely better by the inclusion of Lucina and Robin.  All I need now are their amiibo.

MK 8 is exceptionally pretty and a wonderful Mario Kart game, but that's about all it was for me.

ORAS was alright, but I've never been a fan of Gen III.  I am of the opinion that XY were better and that BW2 have yet to be topped by anything.  Mega Beedrill was the best thing out of it.

NO clue what Project Diva is

Mine would be
Fire Emblem Awakening
Child of Light
and Dragon Age Inquisition

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c36ef46368725e07450a00#post_54c36ef46368725e07450a00
Far Cry is pretty good, but it's essentially a copy/paste of Far Cry 3 into a Himalayan setting.

Between Black Flag in late 2013 and Child of Light in early 2014, I was convinced that Ubisoft was on the way back up after the disappointment of Assassins Creed III.  They seemed more than willing to dash my hopes against the rocks.

topics.body:
Hey guys, I'm currently going over some work with a text based game system, though I'm not a hundred percent sure if it would work out. RAGS is a real pain to get working at times, and also some redundant scripts really screw with the game at times. 

Anyway, I'm trying to make a MLP based text based game, nothing too complicated, rather simple, enjoyable and intricate. Mostly humans and ponies kind of story, with comedy mixed. Also I'm using DP to search for materials to use for it. 

You guys wouldn't happen to know much about scripting do you? Also I may need someone to proof read.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6
